name: CellSar
description:
CellSar is a sandbox game about collecting cells, building machines and organs out of cells and keeping them alive.

Game Features:
• 14 Translation Directions: Cells can be connected to each other or moved in 14 directions: 6 perpendicular ones and 8 diagonal ones.
• Explore: Rich and unique polyhedral cells in a swamp. More than 90 types of cells, each represented by a unique regular-faced polyhedron.
• Build: Use various cell units to build machines and organs: muscle cells provide contraction and movement, connective cells provide adhesion, nerve cells support signal transmission, and macrophages kill hostile bacteria.
• Survival: Collect nutrient and fat cells to feed yourself and other animal cells, keeping them from hunger and disease.
